notes.text: We now ensure that the analytical table supports the contextdefiningproperties annotation
We've resolved an issue that caused incorrect enablement of the action buttons
We now support the sorting of data in micro charts
You can now add additional custom fields to the top of the mass edit dialog
You can now use the context menu to create a new object in the tree table
You can now use the createDocument API to create a document using the Table building block
We now support key user adaptation on the mass edit dialog
We now enable the selection of table rows when the Copy to Clipboard button is visible
We now ensure that applications open correctly in SAP Build Work Zone
We now properly translate the editing status column on the table personalization
We’ve added SAP Collaboration Manager as a further option to the “Share” menu
We no longer consider the text annotation on a groupable property if the target property of the text is non-groupable for analytical tables
We've resolved an issue where the Delete action on a table didn't function correctly after navigating away and returning to the object page
You can now define a custom “save” logic for the Mass Edit dialog using the extensionAPI
We now ensure that the navigate function cannot be retriggered if it has already been called
We now provide a dialog enabling users to directly create a new object in a list report without triggering a navigation to the object page afterwards
We now check the parameter type only if there is a parameter value present in the startup parameters or default values
We now support "Pattern" as a format option for date-and-time-based controls
We now ensure that the correct metamodel is passed to the removeSensitive data function
We now correctly read Boolean parameters that have no value when triggering an action
In InlineCreationRows mode, we now correctly highlight newly created rows in a table
We now ensure the correct selection mode is set in all tables
We've resolved an issue that caused the draftIndicator to appear below fields in grid tables
We now ensure that changes made in the manifest.json file when using feature toggles are not lost after navigating back and forth between apps
We now ensure that if all the selection buttons for intent-based navigation within a menu are hidden, the menu button is also hidden
You can now override the text in the action confirmation popover for a specific action and entity set
We now support defining a field with value help by using a specific property of the singleton entity
We now support the creation of a new entity using the NewAction annotation
We now ensure that the copy action enablement considers the OperationAvailable annotation
We now request the entity properties for a bound action configured with a returned entity type
We now support more formats for startup parameter values when launching an app
We've resolved an issue that caused a crash after saving when the WebSocket annotation was used for side-effect configuration
We now ensure that the messages from the back end containing braces are properly displayed on the UI
We now ensure that the table selection mode works correctly
We now ensure side effects are executed before saving a document on the object page
We now request validation and message side effects in the same batch to improve performance
We've resolved an issue with calling the InvokeAction extension of the EditFlow controller when the context parameter is an array of contexts
We now ensure that back navigation works correctly when an SAP Fiori elements-based application is embedded in another application
We've resolved an issue where the sort icon in the column wasn't functioning correctly
